quote-source: Mike Masnick, House Republicans: Copyright Law Destroys Markets; It’s Time For Real Reform, TechDirt.
quote-text: It goes on to suggest a sliding scale for copyright renewal, after a free initial term of 12 years. The fee for renewal would be a percentage of revenue from the work, and that percentage increases with each additional renewal term. Under such a system, those who are still exploiting the copyright can continue to hold one, but for most, where there is greater benefit to have the work in the public domain, the work goes into the public domain.
